name: Grandma Lou's Cheese Boereg
author: Alex the Armenian
summary: A savory traditional Armenian cheese pastry made with phyllo dough.
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Combine farmer cheese, Muenster cheese, eggs, and parsley in a bowl
Arrange phyllo dough lengthwise on a flat work surface; cut into 3 strips
Brush some butter lightly over 1 strip of phyllo
Cover remaining strips to keep them from drying out
Spoon 1 teaspoon of the farmer cheese mixture on the edge closest to you; fold over 2 sheets of phyllo to make a triangle
Fold again to form another triangle; continue folding to the end of the strip
Repeat with remaining phyllo strips, butter, and cheese mixture
Bake in the preheated oven until golden brown, about 20 minutes
